briefdescription.para: Trait for components that can be enabled/disabled.

detaileddescription.para: When a type `T` satisfies `HasToggleable`, the component can be toggled on/off via `enable()` and `disable()` methods. Both methods must be present for the trait to be satisfied.
void enable() noexcept { isEnabled_ = true; } void disable() noexcept { isEnabled_ = false; } };
